original_text: Its back is like rows of shields. They are as hard as stone with no spaces between them. Its back is like rows of shields.
korean_text: 그의 즐비한 비늘은 그의 자랑이로다 튼튼하게 봉인하듯이 닫혀 있구나

sentences.original_text: Its back is like rows of shields
They are as hard as stone
Its back is like rows of shields
